message.content:
cs.NI, cs.GT, cs.SY, cs.IT, cs.AI

This paper deals with the problem of dynamic relay selection in cellular networks, which is a key issue in the field of network infrastructure (NI) in computer science. The paper also proposes a policy that maximizes the performance of the network under cost constraints, which involves game theory (GT) concepts. The use of Markov Decision Processes (MDP) and Partially Observable Markov Decision Processes (POMDP) suggests that the paper could also belong to the sub-categories of systems and control (SY), information theory (IT), and artificial intelligence (AI).
